sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:25:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. 2. Add minced garlic, ginger, chopped onion, and green chili. Cook until onions are translucent. 3. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. 4. Add spinach and cook until wilted. 5. Allow the mixture to cool, then blend into a smooth paste. 6. Return the mixture to the pan and add cubed paneer, garam masala, turmeric powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, salt, and pepper. 7. Cook for 10-15, until paneer is heated through. 8. Serve hot with rice or naan.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Indian">8f495a179791021069a3b6fce053afcf</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients/> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Palak Paneer</name> <nutrition>Calories: 350, Protein: 20g, Fat: 25g, Carbs: 15g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Chop onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, and green chili. 2. Cube paneer.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:56:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ca5917d797d5021069a3b6fce053afd4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:11</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
